patched_yaml:
apiVersion: batch/v1
kind: Job
metadata:
  name: db-migrator-install
  labels:
    helm.sh/chart: artifact-hub-1.21.0
    app.kubernetes.io/name: artifact-hub
    app.kubernetes.io/instance: release-name
    app.kubernetes.io/version: 1.21.0
    app.kubernetes.io/managed-by: Helm
spec:
  ttlSecondsAfterFinished: 300
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        helm.sh/chart: artifact-hub-1.21.0
        app.kubernetes.io/name: artifact-hub
        app.kubernetes.io/instance: release-name
        app.kubernetes.io/version: 1.21.0
        app.kubernetes.io/managed-by: Helm
    spec:
      automountServiceAccountToken: true
      serviceAccountName: default
      restartPolicy: Never
      initContainers:
      - name: check-db-ready
        image: docker.io/artifacthub/postgres:latest
        imagePullPolicy: IfNotPresent
        env:
        - name: PGHOST
          value: release-name-postgresql.default
        - name: PGPORT
          value: '5432'
        - name: PGUSER
          value: postgres
        command:
        - sh
        - -c
        - until pg_isready; do echo waiting for database; sleep 2; done;
      containers:
      - name: db-migrator
        image: artifacthub/db-migrator:v1.21.0
        imagePullPolicy: IfNotPresent
        env:
        - name: TERN_CONF
          value: /home/db-migrator/.cfg/tern.conf
        volumeMounts:
        - name: db-migrator-config
          mountPath: /home/db-migrator/.cfg
          readOnly: true
        command:
        - ./migrate.sh
      volumes:
      - name: db-migrator-config
        secret:
          secretName: db-migrator-config

apiVersion: batch/v1
kind: Job
metadata:
  name: db-migrator-install
  labels:
    helm.sh/chart: artifact-hub-1.21.0
    app.kubernetes.io/name: artifact-hub
    app.kubernetes.io/instance: release-name
    app.kubernetes.io/version: 1.21.0
    app.kubernetes.io/managed-by: Helm
spec:
  ttlSecondsAfterFinished: null
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        helm.sh/chart: artifact-hub-1.21.0
        app.kubernetes.io/name: artifact-hub
        app.kubernetes.io/instance: release-name
        app.kubernetes.io/version: 1.21.0
        app.kubernetes.io/managed-by: Helm
    spec:
      automountServiceAccountToken: true
      serviceAccountName: default
      restartPolicy: Never
      initContainers:
      - name: check-db-ready
        image: docker.io/artifacthub/postgres:stable
        imagePullPolicy: IfNotPresent
        env:
        - name: PGHOST
          value: release-name-postgresql.default
        - name: PGPORT
          value: '5432'
        - name: PGUSER
          value: postgres
        command:
        - sh
        - -c
        - until pg_isready; do echo waiting for database; sleep 2; done;
      containers:
      - name: db-migrator
        image: artifacthub/db-migrator:v1.21.0
        imagePullPolicy: IfNotPresent
        env:
        - name: TERN_CONF
          value: /home/db-migrator/.cfg/tern.conf
        volumeMounts:
        - name: db-migrator-config
          mountPath: /home/db-migrator/.cfg
          readOnly: true
        command:
        - ./migrate.sh
      volumes:
      - name: db-migrator-config
        secret:
          secretName: db-migrator-config

apiVersion: batch/v1
kind: Job
metadata:
  name: db-migrator-install
  labels:
    helm.sh/chart: artifact-hub-1.21.0
    app.kubernetes.io/name: artifact-hub
    app.kubernetes.io/instance: release-name
    app.kubernetes.io/version: 1.21.0
    app.kubernetes.io/managed-by: Helm
spec:
  ttlSecondsAfterFinished: null
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        helm.sh/chart: artifact-hub-1.21.0
        app.kubernetes.io/name: artifact-hub
        app.kubernetes.io/instance: release-name
        app.kubernetes.io/version: 1.21.0
        app.kubernetes.io/managed-by: Helm
    spec:
      automountServiceAccountToken: true
      serviceAccountName: default
      restartPolicy: Never
      initContainers:
      - name: check-db-ready
        image: docker.io/artifacthub/postgres:latest
        imagePullPolicy: IfNotPresent
        env:
        - name: PGHOST
          value: release-name-postgresql.default
        - name: PGPORT
          value: '5432'
        - name: PGUSER
          value: postgres
        command:
        - sh
        - -c
        - until pg_isready; do echo waiting for database; sleep 2; done;
        securityContext:
          readOnlyRootFilesystem: true
          privileged: false
      containers:
      - name: db-migrator
        image: artifacthub/db-migrator:v1.21.0
        imagePullPolicy: IfNotPresent
        env:
        - name: TERN_CONF
          value: /home/db-migrator/.cfg/tern.conf
        volumeMounts:
        - name: db-migrator-config
          mountPath: /home/db-migrator/.cfg
          readOnly: true
        command:
        - ./migrate.sh
        securityContext:
          readOnlyRootFilesystem: true
          privileged: false
      volumes:
      - name: db-migrator-config
        secret:
          secretName: db-migrator-config

apiVersion: batch/v1
kind: Job
metadata:

  labels:

spec:
  ttlSecondsAfterFinished: null
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        helm.sh/chart: artifact-hub-1.21.0
        app.kubernetes.io/name: artifact-hub

        app.kubernetes.io/version: 1.21.0

    spec:

      restartPolicy: Never
      initContainers:
      - name: check-db-ready

          value: release-name-postgresql.default

          value: '5432'

          value: postgres

        - sh
        - -c
        - until pg_isready; do echo waiting for database; sleep 2; done;
        securityContext:
          runAsNonRoot: true
          privileged: false
      containers:
      - name: db-migrator
        image: artifacthub/db-migrator:v1.21.0
        imagePullPolicy: IfNotPresent

        - name: TERN_CONF

        - name: db-migrator-config

          secretName: db-migrator-config

apiVersion: batch/v1
kind: Job
metadata:
  name: db-migrator-install
  labels:
    helm.sh/chart: artifact-hub-1.21.0
    app.kubernetes.io/name: artifact-hub
    app.kubernetes.io/instance: release-name
    app.kubernetes.io/version: 1.21.0
    app.kubernetes.io/managed-by: Helm
spec:
  ttlSecondsAfterFinished: null
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        helm.sh/chart: artifact-hub-1.21.0
        app.kubernetes.io/name: artifact-hub
        app.kubernetes.io/instance: release-name
        app.kubernetes.io/version: 1.21.0
        app.kubernetes.io/managed-by: Helm
    spec:
      automountServiceAccountToken: true
      serviceAccountName: default
      restartPolicy: Never
      initContainers:
      - name: check-db-ready
        image: docker.io/artifacthub/postgres:latest
        imagePullPolicy: IfNotPresent
        env:
        - name: PGHOST
          value: release-name-postgresql.default
        - name: PGPORT
          value: '5432'
        - name: PGUSER
          value: postgres
        command:
        - sh
        - -c
        - until pg_isready; do echo waiting for database; sleep 2; done;
        resources:
          requests:
            cpu: 100m
            memory: 128Mi
          limits:
            cpu: 500m
            memory: 256Mi
        securityContext:
          privileged: false
      containers:
      - name: db-migrator
        image: artifacthub/db-migrator:v1.21.0
        imagePullPolicy: IfNotPresent
        env:
        - name: TERN_CONF
          value: /home/db-migrator/.cfg/tern.conf
        volumeMounts:
        - name: db-migrator-config
          mountPath: /home/db-migrator/.cfg
          readOnly: true
        command:
        - ./migrate.sh
        resources:
          requests:
            cpu: 100m
            memory: 128Mi
          limits:
            cpu: 500m
            memory: 256Mi
        securityContext:
          privileged: false
      volumes:
      - name: db-migrator-config
        secret:
          secretName: db-migrator-config
